alert.note: Alert for Trimble (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 1:55PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson, northeastern Clark and central Trimble Counties through 230 PM EST... At 153 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bedford, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Jefferson, northeastern Clark Counties in south central Indiana and central Trimble Counties in north central Kentucky, including the following locations... Brooksburg, Monitor, Wises Landing, Trout, Paynesville and Milton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
